Elmagarmid, J. Jing, W. Du, and O. A. Bukhres. Maintaining Consistency of Replicated Data in Multidatabase Systems. In 14th International Conference on Distributed Computing Systems, IEEE Computer Society, Poland, 1994.<P> E. Kuhn, O. A. Bukhres, and A. K. Elmagarmid. Advanced Languages for Multidatabase Systems.
